clang-analyzer-core.NonNullParamChecker.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-core.NonNullParamChecker
Check for null pointers passed as arguments to a function whose arguments are
references or marked with the ‘nonnull’ attribute.
The
clang-analyzer-core.NonNullParamChecker
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-core.NonNullParamChecker.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
